CustomField.description: Formula: Concatenation of other Mailing fields for this Household. Can be updated in Household Edit page but does not update Contact unless "Copy Household Address to Contacts" button is pushed.
CustomField.formula: npo02__MailingStreet__c & BR() & npo02__MailingCity__c & IF(LEN(npo02__MailingCity__c) > 0, ", ", "") & npo02__MailingState__c & " " & npo02__MailingPostalCode__c & if (LEN(npo02__MailingCountry__c)>0,BR()&npo02__MailingCountry__c,"")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula: Concatenation of other Mailing fields for this Household. Can be updated in Household Edit page but does not update Contact unless "Copy Household Address to Contacts" button is pushed.
CustomField.label: Mailing Address
